changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_HEADER', 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_HEADER', 'DATETIME2_TIMESERIES_HEADER';

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.DATETIME2_TIMESERIES_HEADER', 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.DATETIME2_TIMESERIES_HEADER', 'TIMESERIES_HEADER';
